p: In this regard, Tong et al. (2012) reported the chemopreventive activity of apigenin in human keratinocytes by inducing autophagy through the activation of activated protein kinase or AMP-activated protein kinase (AMPK) [ 31]. Additionally, the molecular docking study showed that the metabolites quercetin, kaempferol, and apigenin have affinity on the active sites of paclitaxel and vinca, with a binding energy value âˆ’7 kcal/mol, although this value is lower than that of the reference drugs at both sites [ 32, 33].
